name: Cope
description: This project is all about cope. Everyone copes, no matter if you're winning or losing in life. Cope is a very largely used word especially in the crypto space. You lose a lot of money? You cope. You win a lot of money? You cope. On solana, a lot of people fall victim to rugs and lose a lot of money. In the end they can't blame anyone else but themselves and must cope and move on. Everyone will being coping eventually when this project hits multimillions.
